thread.title: JIM GRINDSTAFF
thread.title_full: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm reviewed by JIM GRINDSTAFF

author: JIM GRINDSTAFF
title: JIM GRINDSTAFF
text: I especially appreciated the direct communication from Brushy Mountain relating to a piece that was back-ordered. As it turned out, the back-ordered piece was only delayed a couple of days. The construction of the hives, the quick delivery, excellent customer service, and free shipping was a great combination that has convinced me to be a regular customer.
